article_title: Sen. Mike Lee on Terrorism and Repealing Obamacare (Video)
article_text:
Sen. Mike Lee talks with Managing Editor Bryan Schott about the Senate successfully passing a repeal of Obamacare and what he hopes to accomplish even though President Obama will veto the measure once it gets to his desk. Sen. Mike Lee talks with Managing Editor Bryan Schott about the Senate successfully passing a repeal of Obamacare and what he hopes to accomplish even though President Obama will veto the measure once it gets to his desk.

He also talks about last week's terrorist attack in San Bernadino and what the appropriate response should be from Americans. Plus, he discusses his efforts to pass criminal justice reform in Congress.
